doc.title: My Quote in the Sunday Times: Plastic makes Goreng Pisang Fantastic
doc.text: So/RB do/VB you/PRP all/RB think/VB it/PRP is/VBZ possible/JJ that/IN hawkers/NNS actually/RB throw/JJ plastic/NN straws/NN and/CC bottles/NN into/IN the/DT oil/NN to/TO make/VB their/PRP$ goreng/JJ pisang/NN more/NN crispy/JJ ?/.
